channel.title: Need help making new pking server!
channel.description:
ok i need a lil help.... wait ALOT of help.... i wana make pretty much the whole world a world of pking.... exept for some safe spots (bank training areas etc....) i want full ancients full mage range melee and working barrows =-9 i also want fast lvling and alot of npc plz help
i also need to know how to let people onto my server..... (if u help u get mod staus on my server)

item.title: Need help making new pking server!
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Ok, firstly this is in the wrong forum. The correct forum would be Here.

Secondly, I know very little about making private servers but I will try my best. If you want to spawn NPCs you firs need to set their Hp. (If you don’t set their Hp the game will freeze.). To learn how to set up Hp, click Here

To spawn the NPCs you set health too click Here. To set monster drops, click Here

If you want to let people on your server follow this Tutorial.

Hope I helped you

Read full topic
item.source: Need help making new pking server!
